item.Q:
Write the character:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
item.A:
yǒu
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character:
name; noun (part of speech); place (e.g. among winners); famous; classifier for people
item.A:
míng

item.A:
traditional: 愛
ài

feeling; emotion; passion; situation
item.A:
qíng

item.A:
bǐ
比较 (比較) bǐjiào compare; contrast; fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather

to describe sth as; an analogy; a simile; a metaphor; an allegory; surname
item.A:
喻 (strokes unavailable)
yù

traditional: 東
dōng
东西 (東西) dōngxi thing; person

item.A:

ōu

traditional: 與
1: yǔ 2: yù

朱 (strokes unavailable)
zhū
朱熹 Zhūxī Zhu Xi or Chu Hsi (1130-1200), also known as Master Zhu 朱子, Song dynasty Confucian writer and propagandist, founder of neo-Confucianism

traditional: 麗
1: Lí 2: lì
美丽 (美麗) měilí beautiful 美丽 (美麗) měilì beautiful

traditional: 葉
yè
叶片 (葉片) yèpiàn folium

nǚ
妇女 (婦女) fùnǚ woman

1: son
2: non-syllabic diminutive suffix; retroflex final
item.A:
traditional: 兒
1: ér 2:
儿童 (兒童) értóng child 这儿 (這兒) zhèr here

item.Q:
Write the character:
ancient; old; palaeo-; surname
item.A:
gǔ
古代 gǔdài ancient times; olden times

item.Q:
Write the character:
substitute; to replace; generation; dynasty; age; period; (historical or geological) era
item.A:
dài
代表 dàibiǎo representative; delegate; to represent; to stand for

item.Q:

to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; since; from
item.A:
dǎ

to disguise oneself; to dress up; adorn
item.A:
扮 (strokes unavailable)

sī

塾 (strokes unavailable)
shú

cōng

item.A:
míng

good (virtuous); benevolent; well-disposed; good at sth; to improve or perfect

liáng

traditional: 窮
qióng

item.Q:
Write the character:
bitter; intensely; miserable; painful
item.A:
kǔ
痛苦 tòngkǔ pain; suffering; painful

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: strong; powerful; better; slightly more than; vigorous; violent; surname
2: to strive; to make an effort
3: stubborn; unyielding
item.A:
traditional: 強
1: qiáng 2: qiǎng 3: jiàng
加强 (加強) jīaqiáng to reinforce; to strengthen; to increase 强迫 (強迫) qiǎngpò compel; force 倔强 (倔強) juéjiàng stubborn; obstinate; unbending

item.Q:
Write the character:
to force; to compel; pressing; urgent
item.A:
迫 (strokes unavailable)
pò
压迫 (壓迫) yāpò oppress; oppression

伤 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 傷
shāng
损伤 (損傷) sǔnshāng to harm; to damage; to injure; impairment; loss; disability

xīn
中心 zhōngxīn center; heart; core

item.Q:
Write the character:
ailment; sickness; illness; disease; fall ill; sick; defect
item.A:
bìng
病人 bìngrén sick person; [medical] patient; invalid

item.Q:
Write the character:
to die; impassable; uncrossable; inflexible; rigid
item.A:
sǐ
死亡 sǐwáng death; deadly

item.Q:
Write the character:
knot; sturdy; to bear (fruit); bond; to tie; to bind; to check out (of a hotel)
item.A:
traditional: 結
jié
结果 (結果) jiéguǒ outcome; result; conclusion; to kill; to dispatch

item.Q:

to marry; marriage; wedding; to take a wife
item.A:
婚 (strokes unavailable)
hūn
婚姻 hūnyīn matrimony; wedding; marriage

坟 (strokes unavailable)

fén
坟墓 (墳墓) fénmù sepulcher; tomb

墓 (strokes unavailable)
mù
坟墓 (墳墓) fénmù sepulcher; tomb

item.Q:

to cry; to weep
item.A:
kū

item.Q:

item.A:

tū

item.Q:

correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
item.A:
rán

between; among; space; (measure word)
item.A:
traditional: 間
jiān

裂 (strokes unavailable)
liè
分裂 fēnliè split up; to split; to divide; to break up; fission

open; operate (vehicle); start; abbr. for degrees Kelvin
item.A:
traditional: 開
kāi

强迫 (強迫) qiǎngpò compel; force

item.Q:
Write the character: jiàng
(juéjiàng de jiàng)
item.A:
traditional: 強
stubborn; unyielding
倔强 (倔強) juéjiàng stubborn; obstinate; unbending

item.Q:
Write the character: pò
(yāpò de pò)
item.A:
迫 (strokes unavailable)
to force; to compel; pressing; urgent
压迫 (壓迫) yāpò oppress; oppression

item.Q:
Write the character: shāng
(sǔnshāng de shāng)
item.A:
伤 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 傷
injure; injury; wound
损伤 (損傷) sǔnshāng to harm; to damage; to injure; impairment; loss; disability

item.Q:
Write the character: xīn
(zhōngxīn de xīn)
item.A:
heart; mind
中心 zhōngxīn center; heart; core

item.Q:
Write the character: bìng
(bìngrén de bìng)
item.A:
ailment; sickness; illness; disease; fall ill; sick; defect
病人 bìngrén sick person; [medical] patient; invalid

item.Q:
Write the character: sǐ
(sǐwáng de sǐ)
item.A:
to die; impassable; uncrossable; inflexible; rigid
死亡 sǐwáng death; deadly

item.Q:
Write the character: jié
(jiéguǒ de jié)
item.A:
traditional: 結
knot; sturdy; to bear (fruit); bond; to tie; to bind; to check out (of a hotel)
结果 (結果) jiéguǒ outcome; result; conclusion; to kill; to dispatch

item.Q:
Write the character: hūn
(hūnyīn de hūn)
item.A:
婚 (strokes unavailable)
to marry; marriage; wedding; to take a wife
婚姻 hūnyīn matrimony; wedding; marriage

item.Q:
Write the character: fén
(fénmù de fén)
item.A:
坟 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 墳
a grave
坟墓 (墳墓) fénmù sepulcher; tomb

item.Q:
Write the character: mù
(fénmù de mù)
item.A:
墓 (strokes unavailable)
tomb
坟墓 (墳墓) fénmù sepulcher; tomb

item.Q:
Write the character: kū
(tòngkū de kū)
item.A:
to cry; to weep
痛哭 tòngkū to cry bitterly

item.Q:
Write the character: tū
(tūrán de tū)
item.A:
突 (strokes unavailable)
to dash; to move forward quickly
突然 tūrán sudden; abrupt; unexpected

item.Q:
Write the character: rán
(ránhòu de rán)
item.A:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
然后 (然後) ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards

item.Q:
Write the character: jiān
(shíjiān de jiān)
item.A:
traditional: 間
between; among; space; (measure word)
时间 (時間) shíjiān time; period

item.Q:
Write the character: liè
(fēnliè de liè)
item.A:
裂 (strokes unavailable)
crack; split
分裂 fēnliè split up; to split; to divide; to break up; fission

item.Q:
Write the character: kāi
(kāishǐ de kāi)
item.A:
traditional: 開
open; operate (vehicle); start; abbr. for 開爾文|开尔文 degrees Kelvin
开始 (開始) kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

item.Q:
Write the character: tiào
(tiàogāo de tiào)
item.A:
jump; hop; skip (a grade); to leap; to bounce; to beat
跳高 tiàogāo (n) high jump

item.Q:
Write the character: hú
(húdié de hú)
item.A:
蝴 (strokes unavailable)
butterfly
蝴蝶 húdié butterfly

item.Q:
Write the character: dié
(húdié de dié)
item.A:
蝶 (strokes unavailable)
butterfly
蝴蝶 húdié butterfly

item.Q:
Write the character: fēi
(fēijī de fēi)
item.A:
traditional: 飛
to fly
飞机 (飛機) fēijī airplane

item.Q:
Write the character: xiáng
(fēixiáng de xiáng)
item.A:
翔 (strokes unavailable)
soar
飞翔 (飛翔) fēixiáng fly
yǒumíng famous; well-known

bǐyù metaphor; analogy; figure of speech; figuratively

traditional: 東方
dōngfāng the East; Eastern countries

traditional: 女兒
nǚér daughter
gǔdài ancient times; olden times
dǎbàn dress up

cōngmíng smart; clever; intelligent; bright
shànliáng good and honest; kind-hearted

traditional: 窮苦
